GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: fix memory leak in ieee80211_if_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit b2c0b94f48373ee743a4d63825a9d52364418837, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 5a490510ba5fce8a10746525357a297f8f076bb1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: wifi: mac80211: fix memory leak in ieee80211_if_add()
